TextView.android:text: Developing an art is the search of the inquisitive mind for creativity. Music and drum have such a beautiful connection and at Sapne - Sagar creates the melodies to sync the amazing relation that these two make. The sticks hit on the drum creating a wave of happiness on our mind and this boy doesn't fail to do it. Sagar Shah - as humble his background is - his efforts are that collosal and commendable!! The world lacks passion and this boy serves the example of being an odd one out because he follows his heart and that is playing drum. Sagar - is a boy developing his skills at this NGO. And Team Sapne is indeed doing a phenomenal task by carving a masterpiece! Team Sapne has such a backing when it comes to his talents and giving confidence to someone to follow their passion is one of the most supreme things that anyone can ever do and Team Sapne serves his purpose. Music never has an end. Passion never does too. Sagar hopes to bring out his talent in front of people. He is an inspiration for all of them - To pursue their passion! A big applause to Sagar for his work and his dedication. This for sure shall shape a melodious future!!
